snippet: Curators may not make a lot of money, but the field comes with its own cachet, and as the art world expands, so does this profession.
abstract: Curators have become important cultural figures within the expanding world of contemporary art, and as more people are drawn to the profession training programs have sprung up around the world.
lead_paragraph: Curators may not make a lot of money, but the field comes with its own cachet, and as the art world expands, so does this profession.

headline.seo: As the Art World Grows, So Does the Curator’s Field
headline.main: The Fine Art of Being a Curator
headline.print_headline: The Fine Art Of Being A Curator
